application.services.AlgorithmDataProcesor module

class application.services.AlgorithmDataProcesor.AlgorithmDataProcesor(file_system_service: FileSystemService)[source]

Bases: object

Class for processing algorithm data and generating evaluation metrics.

file_system_service

Service for file system operations.

Type:

FileSystemService

process(algorithm_data: AlgorithmConfigurator, prediction_data: DataFrame, time: int) → BasicReport[source]

Processes the algorithm data and prediction results to generate evaluation metrics.

Parameters:

  • algorithm_data (AlgorithmConfigurator) – Configuration data for the algorithm.

  • prediction_data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the prediction results.

  • time (int) – The time taken for the algorithm to execute.

Returns:

A report containing the evaluation metrics for the algorithm.

Return type:

BasicReport

Evaluates the given algorithm using the registered evaluator.

Raises:

application.services.TimeEvalWrapper module

class application.services.TimeEvalWrapper.TimeEvalParameters(name: str = 'lstm_vae', execution_type: str = 'execute', data_input: str = 'dataset.csv', data_output: str = 'anomaly_scores.ts', model_input: str = 'model.pkl', model_output: str = 'model.pkl', parameters: dict = <factory>)[source]

Bases: object

Data class for storing parameters related to TimeEval execution.

name

The name of the algorithm. Defaults to “lstm_vae”.

Type:

str

execution_type

The type of execution (e.g., “execute”, “train”). Defaults to “execute”.

Type:

str

data_input

The input data file. Defaults to “dataset.csv”.

Type:

str

data_output

The output data file. Defaults to “anomaly_scores.ts”.

Type:

str

model_input

The input model file. Defaults to “model.pkl”.

Type:

str

model_output

The output model file. Defaults to “model.pkl”.

Type:

str

parameters

Additional parameters for the execution. Defaults to an empty dictionary.

Type:

dict

data_input: str = 'dataset.csv'
data_output: str = 'anomaly_scores.ts'
execution_type: str = 'execute'
model_input: str = 'model.pkl'
model_output: str = 'model.pkl'
name: str = 'lstm_vae'
